projectDesc.p: The Göttingen Register of Electronic Texts in Indian Languages (GRETIL) is a resource platform providing standardized machine-readable texts in Indian languages that have been contributed by various individuals and institutions.

correction.p: Apparent errors have been silently corrected.

normalization.p: GRETIL normalizes all texts contributed consistently for each language. Sanskrit texts are normalized in accordance with the scheme of the International Alphabet of Sanskrit Transliteration (IAST) in order to facilitate word search across its corpus without additional transformations.

All characters that were fully equivalent to an IAST-conformant character in the text file contributed have been made to conform to the character list below. Non-conformant characters with additional information including accents, capitalization, and whitespace have been preserved as orig elements inside choice elements with their IAST-conformant equivalent in reg elements for the creation of a plain text. These additional informations will be available only in those transformations of this file that display the original information.

quotation.p: If indicated unambiguously in the text file contributed quotation marks have been replaced with the q element and, in case a reference was provided, have been nested inside a cit with the respective reference provided in a ref element after the quote.

segmentation.p: Unnumbered div elements are used to structure the text, using the type and n attributes in accordance with the refsDecl.

interpretation.p:
Interpretive markup which is visible only in analytic transformations of this file consists of:
Highlighting in hi elements,
Corruptions in sic elements,
Remarks in note elements with the @resp attribute identifying the agency.

lg.l: sarveṣāṃ bhāvānāṃ sarvatra na vidyate svabhāvaścet /
atha sasvabhāvametadvākyaṃ śrutvā hatā pratijñā te /
evaṃ tava pratijñā lakṣaṇato duṣyate na mama //
pratyakṣeṇa hi tāvan yadyupalabhya vinivartayasi bhāvān /
yadi ca na bhavet svabhāvo dharmāṇāṃ niḥsvabhāva ityevam /
atha vidyate svabhāvaḥ sa ca dharmāṇāṃ na vidyate tasmāt /
dharmairvinā svabhāvaḥ sa yasyāsti tad yuktamupadeṣṭum //
sata eva pratiṣedho nāsti ghaṭo geha ityayaṃ yasmāt /
dṛṣṭaḥ pratiṣedho 'yaṃ sataḥ svabhāvasya te tasmāt //
atha nāsti sa svabhāvaḥ kiṃ nu pratividhyate tvayānena /
nanvevaṃ satyasti grāho grāhyaṃ ca tagdṛhītaṃ ca /
pratiṣedhaḥ pratiṣedhyaṃ pratiṣeddhā ceti ṣaṭkaṃ tat //
atha naivāsti grāho na ca grāhyaṃ na ca grahītāraḥ /
pratiṣedhaḥ pratiṣedhyaṃ pratiṣeddhāro 'sya tu na santi //
pratiṣedhaḥ pratiṣedhyaṃ pratiṣeddhāraśca yadyuta na santi /
hetostato na siddhirnaiḥsvābhāvyāt kuto hi te hetuḥ /
yadi cāhetoḥ siddhiḥ svabhāvavinivartanasya te bhavati /
loke naiḥsvābhāvyānna hi kaścana vidyate bhāvaḥ //
pūrvaṃ cet pratiṣedhaḥ paścāt pratiṣedhyamiti ca nopapannam /
yaśca pratītya bhāvo bhāvānāṃ śūnyateti sā hyuktā /
yaśca pratītya bhāvo bhavati hi tasyāsvabhāvatvam //
nāsti ca vaiṣamikatvaṃ viśeṣahetuśca na nigadyaḥ //
mā śabdavaditi nāyaṃ dṛṣṭānto yastvayā mamārabdhaḥ /
śabdena hi tacca śabdasya vāraṇaṃ naiva me vacaḥ //
athavā sādhyasamo 'yaṃ heturna hi vidyate dhvaneḥ sattā /
yadi kācana pratijñā tatra syādeṣa me bhaveddoṣaḥ /
nāsti ca mama pratijñā tasmānnaivāsti me doṣaḥ //
teṣāṃ punaḥ prasiddhiṃ brūhi kathaṃ te pramāṇānām //
nāsti tamaśca jvalane yatra ca tiṣṭhati sadātmani jvalanaḥ /
kurute kathaṃ prakāśaṃ sa hi prakāśo 'ndhakāravadhaḥ //
utpadyamāna eva prāpnoti tamo na hi hutāśaḥ //
anapekṣya hi prameyānarthān yadi te pramāṇasiddhiḥ /
sidhyanti hi prameyāṇyapekṣya yadi sarvathā pramāṇāni /
kiṃ te pramāṇasiddhyā tāni yadarthaṃ prasiddhaṃ tat //
vyatyaya evaṃ sati te dhruvaṃ pramāṇaprameyāṇām //
atha tai pramāṇasiddhyā prameyasiddhiḥ prameyasiddhyā cā
sidhyanti hi pramāṇairyadi prameyāṇi tāni taireva /
sidhyanti ca prameyairyadi pramāṇāni tāni taireva /
pitrā yadyutpādyaḥ putro yadi tena caiva putreṇa /
utpādyaḥ sa yadi pitā vada tatrotpādayati kaḥ kam //
kaśca pitā kaḥ putrastatra tvaṃ brūhi tāvubhāvapi ca /
bhavati na ca prameyairna cāpyakasmāt pramāṇānām //
yadi ca pratītya kuśalaḥ svabhāva utpadyate sa kuśalānām /
dharmāṇāṃ parabhāvaḥ svabhāva evaṃ kathaṃ bhavati //
atha na pratītya kiṃcit svabhāva utpadyate sa kuśalānām /
nādharmo dharmo vā saṃvyavahārāśca laukikā na syuḥ /
yaḥ sadbhūtaṃ nāma brūyāt sa svabhāva ityevam /
bhavatā prativaktavyo nāma brūmaśca na vyaṃ sat //
nāmāsaditi ca yadidaṃ tatkiṃ nu sato bhavatyutāsataḥ /
yadi hi sato yadyasato dvidhāpi te hīyate vādaḥ //
atha vidyate svabhāvaḥ sa ca dharmāṇāṃ na vidyata iti /
sata eva pratiṣedho yadi śūnyatvaṃ nanvapratiṣiddhamidam /
pratiṣedhayase 'tha tvaṃ śūnyatvaṃ tacca nāsti śūnyatvam /
pratiṣedhaḥ sata iti te nanvevaṃ hīyate vādaḥ //
pratiṣedhayāmi nāhaṃ kiṃcit pratiṣedhyamasti na ca kiṃcit /
tatrāpi nirṇayaṃ śṛṇu yathā sa dṛṣṭānta upapannaḥ //
sa yadi svabhāvataḥ syāt bhāvo na syāt pratītyasamudbhūtaḥ /
yaśca pratītya bhavati grāho nanu śūnyatā saiva //
yadi ca svabhāvataḥ syād grāhaḥ kastaṃ nivartayed grāhyam /
etena hetvabhāvaḥ pratyuktaḥ pūrvameva sa samatvāt /
yastraikālye hetuḥ pratyuktaḥ pūrvameva sa samatvāt /
prabhavati ca śūnyateyaṃ yasya prabhavanti tasya sarvārthāḥ /
prabhavati na tasya kiṃ na bhavati śūnyatā yasyeti //
